data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Lomami.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Lomami. Through your servants plant 272 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Lomami unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.focus_label: Lomami, Democratic Republic of the Congo
